document.full_text: nigerians pick their next leader on saturday in what they hope will be their first credible presidential election for decades, polls which could make or break the country's standing as a democratic leader in africa.
document.title: nigerians pick president in crucial election
lines_and_colors: nigerians pick their next leader on saturday in what they hope will be their first credible presidential election for decades, polls which could make or break the country's standing as a democratic leader in africa.
